channel.title: Rule number 3 and 4
channel.description:
3# We don't make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use "you" not "u", we use "why" not "y" etc.
4# We don't make posts that contain useless information. Posts like "cool", "lol", "yeah" and "I agree" don't contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
It's getting out of control, it's not really fun to type like this:"LOL MAAN LAWL PLX GIEV FREE ITAMS!" on purpose. No, it's not funny. It has never been, so please, stop it. I won't say any names because I'm sure they know who I mean. Why don't you just ban them? They aren't doing it accidently, but they are just trolling and TRYING (notice the word trying) be funny. This forum has started to be low quality. Please do something about it.

item.title: Rule number 3 and 4
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

popcorn89:

If you were a cop, and witnessed a murder, would you just look the other way?

I enforce rule 4 a lot, but 3 isn’t really a rule you can punish people for, it takes 10~ seconds to warn someone and there’s at least 90k people who have broken it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rule number 3 and 4
item.dc:creator: @popcorn89 popcorn89
item.description:
@popcorn89 wrote:

If you were a cop, and witnessed a murder, would you just look the other way?

Read full topic

item.title: Rule number 3 and 4
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“popcorn89, post:5, topic:95059”]They enforce the rules when it suits them…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,20.0.html[/quote]
If you were staff, you’d probably realise that it can be difficult enforcing a lot of rules. I mean, if Pwnd or another gmod went over to Moparscape and handed out a lot of mutes (or bans) for rule 3, then it would probably be questionable (questionable because it seems to have become the norm there).

I’ve got a good idea though - why don’t you treat rule 3 like a social rule? If you see someone writing like that, tell them that it’s not wanted (keep it friendly) and that if they can’t type properly they can leave. Social pressure can do so much more then any law-enforcing groups (eg the police) in a lot of cases.

Read full topic

item.title: Rule number 3 and 4
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:1, topic:95064”]people make mistakes, it saves typing time with #3.
i mean no one can say that dont do.[/quote]

If you are really so hurry that you can’t press two extra buttons to type full word, how do you have time to read forums?
I never spell you as u. (Just did )

Read full topic

item.title: Rule number 3 and 4
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

i can actually agree to this in one way. I don’t mind joking about it, but the serious people who just don’t spell proper haven’t read the rules and therefore aren’t allowed to use this website. Ban them all.

Read full topic
